content: the hat that started it all for me thank god for hipsters and fishermen this is the updated knitting pattern for my fisherman s cap that everybody seems to love on youtube i go more in depth about sizing and added a short faq of all the things that people love to ask me about with this pattern it s simple enough for a more advanced beginner but not too simple that it s boring i love ribbing because you can zone out a little bit but it s more exciting than just knitting plain a version of this pattern is up on my youtube but this is slightly different with better math skills and explanations haha this is a knitting pattern not a finished hat you will receive a pdf to follow *sizes* s 18-20 around 8 5 long m 20-22 around 8 5 long l 22-24 around 9 long xl 24-26 around 9 5 long with extra guidance on custom sizing included *materials needed* 4 5mm 16 circular knitting needle 4-5 4 5mm double pointed needles a stitch marker or scrap of yarn tied in a loop 200-250 metres of worsted weight yarn l and xl may need more than one skein tapestry needle scissors
